MAX INT8
===
> Maximum signed 8-bit integer.

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var INT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-max' );
```

#### INT8_MAX

Maximum 8-bit signed integer.

``` javascript
INT8_MAX === (Math.pow(2,7) - 1);
```
<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var INT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-max' );

console.log( INT8_MAX );
// returns 127
```
<!-- </examples> -->
